statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Inventory ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 20.00;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND unit_price < 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory
SELECT product_name, unit_price * quantity AS total_price FROM Inventory WHERE unit_price > 30 ORDER BY total_price DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, transaction_type, transaction_time FROM inventory INNER JOIN transactions ON inventory.item_id = transactions.item_id;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'IN' ORDER BY transaction_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM robots WHERE status='Active';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity_sold FROM transactions WHERE quantity_sold < 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT robot_name, location, status FROM robots WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 50 AND product_name LIKE '%robot%';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_type, o.order_date FROM Transactions t JOIN Orders o ON t.order_id = o.order_id;
SELECT order_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM Transactions GROUP BY order_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT Users.username, Orders.order_date, Inventory.product_name FROM Users JOIN Orders ON Users.user_id = Orders.order_id JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.id;
SELECT Transactions.transaction_id, Orders.order_id, Users.username FROM Transactions JOIN Orders ON Transactions.order_id = Orders.order_id JOIN Users ON Orders.order_id = Users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_name, inventory_level FROM robots ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT robot_name, robot_type FROM robots WHERE inventory_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM parts WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT robot_name, robot_type, inventory_level FROM robots WHERE robot_type = 'Android';
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM parts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_date, quantity_changed FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type LIKE '%order%' AND quantity_changed < 0;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
